column4: for gutsy, if i want to use the entire disk can i still import settings? if i dual boot can i safely delete the windows partition without effecting ubuntu and the imported settings?
I assume you can since you "imported" them. You probably copied them over. But don't trust me on this since I've never done that. What is Windows?
lol. if you go to dual boot it gives you the option to import windows files and settings for certain programs. i'm trying to replace windows with ubuntu and save time by doing that as well.
